Db2Excel.name: 统计
Db2Excel.sql: select 'TD' 制式,'DATANG' 厂商,网元类型 分类,count(*) 参数数量 from( select max(t0.id) 规范中所在行,max(replace(t1.table_related,'CM.O_T_D_','')) 网元类型,max(upper(t0.cnname)) 中文名,max(replace(t1.table_related,'CM.O_T_D_','')) 平台对应类型,max(t1.param_name) 平台对应字段,max(replace(t1.table_related,'CM.O_T_D_','')) 厂家对应表名,max(t1.param_name) 厂家对应字段名 from wuyg_param_td_datang t0,dataset_info t1 where cnname is not null and netype is not null and vendor='DATANG' and datatype='参数'and upper(enname) =param_name group by enname order by 5) group by 网元类型

Db2Excel.name: 同一网元类型出现多次的参数
Db2Excel.sql: select id 规范中所在行,netype 网元类型, cnname 中文名,enname 英文名 from wuyg_param_td_datang where enname in ( select enname from wuyg_param_td_datang group by netype,enname,cnname having count(*)>1 ) order by 2,3

Db2Excel.name: 无网元类型或参数中文名
Db2Excel.sql: select id 规范中所在行,netype 网元类型, cnname 中文名,enname 英文名 from wuyg_param_td_datang where cnname is null or netype is null

Db2Excel.name: 待处理
Db2Excel.sql: select id 规范中所在行,netype 网元类型, cnname 中文名,enname 英文名 from wuyg_param_td_datang where upper(enname) not in ( select param_name from dataset_info where vendor='DATANG' and datatype='参数' ) and cnname is not null and netype is not null
